column2: Student is in a different public school in the same local education agency
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and is in a different public school in the same local education agency.

column2: Transferred to a public school in a different local education agency in the same state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a public school in a different local education agency in the same state.

column2: Transferred to a public school in a different state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a public school in a different state.

column2: Transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries as the same local education agency
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries as the same local education agency.

column2: Transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries of a different LEA in the same state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries of a different LEA in the same state.

column2: Transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school in a different state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a private, non-religiously-affiliated school in a different state.

column2: Transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries of the same local education agency
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries of the same local education agency.

column2: Transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries of a different LEA in the same state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school within the geographic boundaries of a different LEA in the same state.

column2: Transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school in a different state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a private, religiously-affiliated school in a different state.

column2: Transferred to a school outside of the country
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a school outside of the country.

column2: Transferred to an institution
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to an institution.

column2: Transferred to home schooling
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to home schooling.

column2: Transferred to a charter school in a different LEA in the state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a charter school in a different LEA in the same state.

column2: Graduated with regular, advanced, International Baccalaureate, or other type of diploma
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and graduated with regular, advanced, International Baccalaureate, or other type of diploma.

column2: Completed school with other credentials
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and completed school with other credentials.

column2: Withdrawn due to illness
column4: The student was withdrawn due to illness.

column2: Expelled or involuntarily withdrawn
column4: The student was expelled or involuntarily withdrawn.

column2: Reached maximum age for services
column4: The student reached maximum age for services.

column2: Discontinued schooling
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and discontinued schooling.

column2: Completed grade 12, but did not meet all graduation requirements
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and completed grade 12, but did not meet all graduation requirements.

column2: Enrolled in a postsecondary early admission program
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and enrolled in a postsecondary early admission program.

column2: Not enrolled, unknown status
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and the reason is presently unknown. It is expected this temporary option will be changed when the reason for exit has been determined.

column2: Student is in the same LEA, receiving education services, but is not assigned to a particular school
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and the student is in the same LEA, receiving education services, but is not assigned to a particular school.

column2: Not enrolled, eligible to return
column4: The student exited from membership in the education institution for an extended period unrelated to any other existing exit code. It is expected the student will return to this school after the reason for the extended period has completed

column2: Enrolled in a foreign exchange program
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and is enrolled in a foreign exchange program.

column2: Exited
column4: The student was exited from membership in the educational institution for administrative or system requirements and will be reenrolled in the same educational institution with a new Enrollment Entry Date.

column2: Student is in a charter school managed by the same local education agency
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and is in a charter school managed by the same local education agency.

column2: Completed with a state-recognized equivalency certificate
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and completed with a state-recognized equivalency certificate.

column2: Other
column4: The circumstances under which the student exited from membership in an educational institution is in a category not yet defined in CEDS.

column2: Officially withdrew and enrolled in ABE, adult secondary education, or adult ESL program
column4: The student officially withdrew and enrolled in an adult basic education, adult secondary education, or adult English as a Second Language program.

column2: Officially withdrew and enrolled in a workforce training program
column4: The student officially withdrew and enrolled in a workforce training program.

column2: Died
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution due to death.

column2: Permanently incapacitated
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and is permanently incapacitated.

column2: Student is expected to return to the same school
column4: The student is expected to return to the same school at the beginning of the next school year.

column2: Transferred to a charter school in a different state
column4: The student exited from membership in the educational institution and transferred to a charter school in a different state.
